text: Dame Emma Thomas, Lady Nolan (born 9 December 1971) is an English movie producer. She is known for producing movies like The Prestige, Batman Begins, The Dark Knight, Inception, and The Dark Knight Rises, in which all movies are directed by her husband Christopher Nolan. She also produced the 2013 movie Man of Steel. She won an Academy Award in 2024 when the movie she produced, Oppenheimer won the Academy Award for Best Picture. ==Personal life== Born in London, England, she was educated at University College London where she meet her husband Christopher Nolan. Her career began in 1997 and has produced almost all of Nolan's films. Thomas married Nolan in 1997. They have four children. They currently live in London, England and Los Angeles, California. ==Filmography== Producer * Following (1998) * Memento (2000) * Insomnia (2002) * Batman Begins (2005) * The Prestige (2006) * The Dark Knight (2008) * Inception (2010) * The Dark Knight Rises (2012) * Man of Steel (2013) *Interstellar (2014) *Dunkirk (2017) *Tenet (2020) *Oppenheimer (2023) ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:English movie producers Category:Christopher Nolan Category:Living people Category:1971 births Category:Alumni of University College London Category:Movie producers from California Category:People from Los Angeles
title: Emma Thomas
